ROC curve data

Source: R/blr-plots-data.R
blr_prep_roc_data.Rd

Data for generating ROC curve.

blr_prep_roc_data(gains_table)

Arguments

gains_table

An object of clas blr_gains_table

Examples

model <- glm(honcomp ~ female + read + science, data = hsb2,
             family = binomial(link = 'logit'))
gt <- blr_gains_table(model)
blr_prep_roc_data(gt)
#> # A tibble: 11 x 4
#>    sensitivity specificity sensitivity_per `1 - specificity`
#>          <dbl>       <dbl>           <dbl>             <dbl>
#>  1        NA          NA             0                0     
#>  2        26.4        95.9           0.264            0.0408
#>  3        50.9        91.2           0.509            0.0884
#>  4        69.8        84.4           0.698            0.156 
#>  5        83.0        75.5           0.830            0.245 
#>  6        88.7        63.9           0.887            0.361 
#>  7        94.3        52.4           0.943            0.476 
#>  8        96.2        39.5           0.962            0.605 
#>  9       100          27.2           1                0.728 
#> 10       100          13.6           1                0.864 
#> 11       100           0             1                1
